name: just a man
body:
# Rules for Greatness #
1. Be Awesome.
1. Use the Right Tools

since I don't write code, I must preface with this statement.
 
 *I cannot judge the functionality unless it alters my experience, but if it does, it is already too late.*


## User Interface ##

user interface can make or break an application.  use the right components and you may stand a chance against the modern users high expectations.
http://screensiz.es/ 

### Frameworks ###
- [Bootstrap] (http://twitter.github.io/bootstrap/)
- [Flat UI] (http://designmodo.com/demo/flat-ui/)
- [Almost Flat UI] (http://websymphony.net/almost-flat-ui/)



### Forms ###
https://github.com/harvesthq/chosen 

### Grids ###
- Hell Yea. http://backgridjs.com/
- Going to the next page is for suckers.  http://airbnb.github.io/infinity/ 
- The grid and beyond with reclinejs - http://reclinejs.com/

### Icons ###

- Sample Avatars [http://uifaces.com]


### Fonts ###

## How's Your Flow? ##

## Mock Ups ##

Balsamiq is cool, easy to use and has a user base that has reached critical mass - that means extensionsâ€¦

- Balsamiq to Any [http://code.google.com/p/bmml2any/]
- MockGen (http://www.mockgen.com)



### Designers/Builders ###

- http://www.layoutit.com

Jetstrap (https://jetstrap.com)

- https://www.easel.io

### Mobile UI ###

- http://blog.filesq.com/spoon/

## Application Framework ##

### Ruby ###
- Ruby on Rails 
- Sinatra

### Python ###
- Django - powerful, but a bit more complex to get started.

### Nodejs ###
- Yeoman
- Tower.js

## DevOps ##

- AWS - widely availible user scripts and deployable VM scripts plus support for JuJu.
    - Reserved Instance pricing offers signifigant discounts, if planned usage is high.
- Azure - integrateable with VisualStudio and Microsoft Stack, but not as much support (no JuJu support as of 06-03-2013)
